Header.title: VoiceIt
Header.paragraph: From Audio to Text – Transcription and Summaries Made Easy.

About.paragraph: VoiceIt empowers you to effortlessly upload or record audio, transforming spoken words into accurate transcriptions and concise summaries. Whether you're capturing meeting notes, interviews, lectures, or personal thoughts, VoiceIt ensure your audio content becomes easily readable and shareable. Designed with simplicity and efficiency in mind, VoiceIt helps you focus on what matters most—understanding and acting on your insights. Say goodbye to tedious manual transcriptions and hello to seamless audio-to-text solutions.

Features.title: Upload audio files
Features.text: Transcribe your audio files! Supports .mp3, .wav, .flac, .aac, and .ogg files.

Features.title: Record your voice
Features.text: Record yourself and get a transcript of your speech!

Features.title: Summarize your audio
Features.text: Get a summary of your recordings and audio files!
